channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8934] Fix bunch of flaky tests
item.description: I am fixing a bunch of flaky tests that have failed on our windows 0.94.6 based builds, or apache trunk builds or apache 0.94 builds.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Here is a first cut, which (hopefully) fixes 7 tests.
+1 Add to trunk and 0.95 too please.

Pardon my impatience Enis. I applied your patches. I'm a little fixated on getting tests to pass and stuff like your changes in HTU look like they'd generally help. Hope you don't mind.

Committed to 0.94, 0.95, and trunk.
TestAdmin doesn't compile? Exceptions are moved to o.a.h.h.exceptions?

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #4249 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/4249/)
